rules_text:
When Shrine to the Killing Arts enters, choose one or more of the following cards: Lightning Helix, Solar Flare, Excise Faith, Eclipse Life, Grisly Indulgence, and/or Drown in Blood. Conjure one of those cards into your hand and the rest shuffled into your library. [i](They’re instants that cost {R}{W}, {R}{G}, {W}{B}, {B}{G}, {B}{R}, and {B}{B} respectively with “This spell deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.”)[/i]
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.
